publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7780 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to Mark Boyle—That the Parliament congratulates Mark Boyle on his plan to raise £10,000 for Barnardo’s by performing a 24-hour DJ set, playing in six different venues; recognises the importance of fundraising events such as this, and acknowledges the good work done by children’s charities such as Barnardo’s, which has been helping children since 1867.
S3M-7780 Congratulations to Mark Boyle (lodged on 24 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
